message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
That's a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $85 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105.
I appreciate you coming down, but $105 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about $90?  That's a fair compromise, and it's the highest I can go.
I understand you're trying to find a fair price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to make another concession and meet you at $110.
